entry.string: Show information in this block for the following repositories:
entry.translation: Shoo inffurmeshun in thees bluck fur zee fullooeeng repuseeturies:

entry.string: There are no repositories registered. No information can be shown in this block
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu repuseeturies regeestered. Bork bork bork! Nu inffurmeshun cun be-a shoon in thees bluck
